Uses of Package
org.apache.hama.bsp.sync

  • Packages that use org.apache.hama.bsp.sync 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp
    BSP computing framework.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.ft  
    org.apache.hama.bsp.sync
    Contains the base implementation of a barrier synchronization agent.
    org.apache.hama.pipes  
    org.apache.hama.pipes.protocol  
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp.sync used by org.apache.hama.bsp 
    Class and Description
    BSPPeerSyncClient 
    MasterSyncClient
    MasterSyncClient defines the behavior that BSPMaster should follow to perform different required globally synchronized state changes.
    PeerSyncClient
    PeerSyncClient defines the behavior that a BSPPeer performs to maintain synchronized global state as it progresses.
    SyncClient
    Basic interface for a client that connects to a sync server.
    SyncEvent
    A distributed global synchronization event.
    SyncEventListener
    This class is used to define a listener to the synchronized global event.
    SyncException 
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp.sync used by org.apache.hama.bsp.ft 
    Class and Description
    MasterSyncClient
    MasterSyncClient defines the behavior that BSPMaster should follow to perform different required globally synchronized state changes.
    PeerSyncClient
    PeerSyncClient defines the behavior that a BSPPeer performs to maintain synchronized global state as it progresses.
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.bsp.sync used by org.apache.hama.bsp.sync 
    Class and Description
    MasterSyncClient
    MasterSyncClient defines the behavior that BSPMaster should follow to perform different required globally synchronized state changes.
    PeerSyncClient
    PeerSyncClient defines the behavior that a BSPPeer performs to maintain synchronized global state as it progresses.
    SyncClient
    Basic interface for a client that connects to a sync server.
    SyncEvent
    A distributed global synchronization event.
    SyncEventListener
    This class is used to define a listener to the synchronized global event.
    SyncException 
    SyncServer
    Basic interface for a barrier synchronization services.
    SyncServerRunner
    Thread runner for a sync server.
    ZKSyncClient
    A Zookeeper based BSP distributed synchronization client that provides primitive synchronization API's
